title: A chetna tur mi a zawng
lyrics:
Lal Saula ralthuam a ngai lo va,
Amah rin ngamna ka thuam a ni;
Hmalam thlir lova chunglam thlirtu,
nih hi ka tan hian a tawk.

Thunawn:
Lalpa mit chu hmun tinah a leng ruai a,
A lama rilru dik tak putu an awm phawt chuan;
A chakzia tilang turin Lalpa a ngawi rei ngai lo,
Lalpa mit chuan a chetna tur mi a zawng ruai a ni.

Rawhtuina mei kan thihna tur maw,
kan zam lo, Lalpa kan phat thei lo;
Nun hlana i thu zawm tu te hi,
kan thi lo, chhantu kan nei.

Lalpa tan chuan harsa a awm lo,
theih loh, tlai tawh pawh a awm thei lo;
Engkimin a thupek an awih thin,
A thua awm vek an ni.
